mapper.select: select sa_code,work_start_time,attendance_status from work_record where #{id} = substr(sa_code,0,INSTR(sa_code,'/')-1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_record(w_code, sa_code, work_start_time) VALUES (#{w_code}, #{sa_code}, #{work_start_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE work_record SET work_end_time = #{work_end_time}, working_hours = (#{work_end_time}-work_start_time) WHERE w_code = #{w_code}
mapper.select: select c.work_place_name, s.sa_code from contract c,employee e,salary s where c.p_id = #{p_id} AND c.c_code = e.c_code AND e.em_code =s.em_code
